House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07821
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO AMEND REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10868, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE CENTENARIANS ACT OF 2016 AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Provides an advanced cash gift of P90,000.00 to people who reaches the age of ninety (90) years old and the balance of P10,000.00 shall be given when he or she will reach one hundred (100) years old.
